text: tum to allaah se hatakar bas moortiyon ko pooj rahe ho aur jhooth ghad rahe ho. tum allaah se hatakar jinako poojate ho ve tumhaare lie rozee ka bhee adhikaar nahin rakhate. atah tum allaah hee ke yahaan rozee talaash karo aur usee kee bandagee karo aur usake aabhaaree bano. tumhen usee kee or lautakar jaana hai
